marklogic.body:
Yeah, between that and the fact that he's 1 of the few indie successes of the past few years, I'm surprised that it didn't take.Â Mess And Noise to Triple J to Europe to Asia to North America is rather impressive.Â http://www.messandnoise.com/news/4311865Â Granted, he's lukewarm on the song itself.Â Between his Off-kilterÂ songwriting and his excellent taste in animation for music videos, I'd be happy to have him overexposed here.
Genevieve's probably going to freak out over Kimbra when her album gets a domestic release, though. Steven ought to like Royal Headache, too.
